import React from "react"; class YearMonthPicker extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ "year":2018, "month":5 } } render(){ var cyear=this.state.year; return (
{cyear-2} {cyear-1} {cyear} {cyear+1} {cyear+2}
1月 2月 3月 4月 5月 6月
7月 8月 9月 10月 11月 12月
) } } export default YearMonthPicker;
